install.name: Efemerides
install.author: Hermes Ojeda Ruiz
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: Easy module to display important historical events

param.name: use_css
param.label: Use default CSS
param.description: Allow use the default CSS of the module

param.name: date_range
param.label: Date Range
param.description: Defines the range of dates to show

param.name: order_by
param.label: Order
param.description: Defines the order for the events

param.name: use_random
param.label: Random
param.description: Shows the events in no particular order

param.name: formatted_date
param.label: Formatted Date
param.description: Shows the date with format, be careful, a very ancient date don't be formatted

param.name: text_show
param.label: Text to Show
param.description: Text to show on the module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable). this allows individual module styling.

param.name: ilinks
param.label: Show individual link
param.description: Show a link for every element on the list to go for a individual description
